Sugar_Land.Pecan Grove, Texas:
Pecan Grove is a census-designated place and master-planned community within the extraterritorial jurisdiction of Richmond in Fort Bend County, Texas, United States. The population was 15,963 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==

Pecan Grove is located northeast of the center of Fort Bend County at 29°37′34″N 95°43′54″W (29.626060, -95.731591).
